alert_section_nt_defense.message: Direct seat defense to a 1NT opening

alert_define_your_alerts.message: Define your automatic alerts. If a text box below is left empty, no auto alert will be made. Use the standard BBO !c, !d, !h, !s notations for the club, diamond, heart, and spade suit symbols respectively. These will be replaced with $CDH_HTML$, and $S_HTML$. For example, “!c+!d 5-5 or better”, will be alerted as, “♣+♦, 5-5 or better”. BBO limits alerts to 39 characters.
alert_define_your_alerts.description: Define your automatic alerts. If a text box below is left empty, no auto alert will be made. Use the standard BBO !c, !d, !h, !s notations for the club, diamond, heart, and spade suit symbols respectively. These will be replaced with $CDH_HTML$, and $S_HTML$. For example, “!c+!d 5-5 or better”, will be alerted as, “♣+♦, 5-5 or better”. BBO limits alerts to 39 characters.

alert_auto_alert_occurs.message: When an auto alert occurs, the user is notified by a brief popup. Owing to limitations on how well BBO Helper can integrate with the BBO application, the auto alert will not otherwise show up on your screen. Nonetheless, it is communicated to your opponents, shows up in the History pane later, and is otherwise be included in the permanent record of the hand. If an auto alert is incorrect, you may change it by providing an explanation in the usual manner.
alert_auto_alert_occurs.description: When an auto alert occurs, the user is notified by a brief popup. Owing to limitations on how well BBO Helper can integrate with the BBO application, the auto alert will not otherwise show up on your screen. Nonetheless, it is communicated to your opponents, shows up in the History pane later, and is otherwise be included in the permanent record of the hand. If an auto alert is incorrect, you may change it by providing an explanation in the usual manner.

alert_remember_save.message: Remember to save any changes before closing this window.
alert_remember_save.description: Remember to save any changes before closing this window.

alert_full_disclosure.message: Auto Alerts simplify full disclosure. Please take advantage of this functionality. For example, if you systematically have 4+ diamonds when you open 1$D_HTML$ except when you have 4=4=3=2 shape, indicate this with, “4+ cd, unless 4=4=3=2”.
alert_full_disclosure.description: Auto Alerts simplify full disclosure. Please take advantage of this functionality. For example, if you systematically have 4+ diamonds when you open 1$D_HTML$ except when you have 4=4=3=2 shape, indicate this with, “4+ cd, unless 4=4=3=2”.
